Markup: scss/components/definitions/_fonts-definition.html 
<h1 class="fw-normal">Playfair Display Regular</h1>
<h1 class="fw-normal fs-italic">Playfair Display Italic</h1>
<h1 class="fw-bold">Playfair Display Bold</h1>
<h1 class="fw-bold fs-italic">Playfair Display Bold Italic</h1>
<h1 class="ffss fw-normal">Barlow Regular</h1>
<h1 class="ffss fw-normal fs-italic">Barlow Italic</h1>
<h1 class="ffss fw-bold">Barlow Bold</h1>
<h1 class="ffss fw-bold fs-italic">Barlow Bold Italic</h1>

<h1 class="fz-step--2">.fz-step--2</h1>
<h1 class="fz-step--1">.fz-step--1</h1>
<h1 class="fz-step-0">.fz-step-0</h1>
<h1 class="fz-step-1">.fz-step-1</h1>
<h1 class="fz-step-2">.fz-step-2</h1>
<h1 class="fz-step-3">.fz-step-3</h1>
<h1 class="fz-step-4">.fz-step-4</h1>
<h1 class="fz-step-5">.fz-step-5</h1>
<h1 class="fz-step-6">.fz-step-6</h1>
<h1 class="fs-normal">.fs-normal</h1>
<h1 class="fs-italic">.fs-italic</h1>
<h1 class="fw-normal">.fw-normal</h1>
<h1 class="fw-bold">.fw-bold</h1>
<h1 class="fw-bold">.fw-bold</h1>
<h1>Heading 1</h1>
<h2>Heading 2</h2>
<h3>Heading 3</h3>
<h4>Heading 4</h4>
<h5>Heading 5</h5>
<h6>Heading 6</h6>
